content: this lacy baby blanket crochet pattern creates a beautiful crochet lace blanket it s perfect for a christening or heirloom blanket or a really special baby shower gift it s an easy crochet baby blanket pattern that uses only simple stitches and has a lovely shell blanket border this pattern has step-by-step written instructions as well as a video tutorial about this crochet lace blanket - you can use any size 3 yarn also referred to as dk or light worsted - make it for a baby girl or baby boy or as a gender-neutral baby blanket - the pattern is completely customizable so you can easily adjust the width and height of the blanket - the shell blanket border compliments the blanket for a lovely finish - the blanket is reversible and looks beautiful on either side
